Others: Chicago Bulls suffered a surprising loss at home on Monday night to the previously winless Utah Jazz
Nikola Vucevic had a double-double with 23 points, 10 rebounds, and 6 assists
Vucevic shot 54.8% from the field and 48.5% from three-point range
Bulls fans are considering trade possibilities for Vucevic due to his impressive performance
Bulls head coach Billy Donovan praised Vucevic's play
Vucevic expressed satisfaction with his shooting and playmaking
